WidgetInfo.Description: A widget which will perform an attribute based search
WidgetInfo.Label: Search
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to carry out a search on the map data

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Label: Target
Parameter.Description: The frame, window, or TaskPane in which to display any UI for the widget. If empty, a new window is used

Parameter.Name: Prompt
Parameter.Description: The prompt to display beside the user input
Parameter.Label: Prompt

Parameter.Name: Layer
Parameter.Description: Layer name in the map on which to carry out the search
Parameter.Label: Layer

Parameter.Name: Filter
Parameter.Description: The search expression template to return features
Parameter.Label: Filter

Parameter.Name: MatchLimit
Parameter.Description: The maximum number of hits to return
Parameter.Label: Match limit

Parameter.Name: ResultColumns
Parameter.Description: An XML structure describing the columns to be returned as part of the search and their labels
Parameter.Label: ResultColumns

Parameter.Name: Title
Parameter.Description: The title to use for the search form
Parameter.Label: Title
